channel.title: [PI] Objects - Adding 'Options'
channel.description: So ive spawned an object its in the objectmanager.java etc.. However it has no optons. Just Examine. I just want know how to add say an option of 'pickup' intructions please! Be semi specific as well client or server sided? or both?

item.title: [PI] Objects - Adding 'Options'
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

[quote=“eballer48, post:3, topic:413496”][quote author=demps2k9 link=topic=514997.msg3739139#msg3739139 date=1315207071]
It is client sided to add options I believe.

Class5 for monsters, class8 for items and I do not know the class for objects, sorry.
[/quote]

Not to be rude but im tired and have been looking for this for several hours but…
How the fuck does this help me? -.-"[/quote]
It helps you by stating politely that you are posting in the wrong section. Dumbass.

Read full topic
